document_data.name: Kao Shan Ten
document_data.mainbody: '''Kao Shan Ten''' was the Imperial Wu Jen of [[Shou Lung]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History:
Kao Shan Ten had assisted and protected Emperor [[Kai Tsao Shou Chin]] since he was very young. He was a master of [[the Way|White Chung Tao]].

In 1358, only Kao Shan Ten knew that the Emperor had sent an adventuring party to find General [[Goyat Nagumo]] under the suggestion of a dream.
document_data.Personality: He was a simple and loyal man, with a deep intellect.
